options.label: tranlator server like (e.g. google translate):
options.tooltip:
Howto use later in chat:
 msg{number}{toLang}⟦Tab⟧ or 
 msg{number}{fromLang}{toLang}⟦Tab⟧ 
number = how many of the last chat messages you want to translate.
fromLang = the language you want to translate from(default: en). 
toLang = the language you want to translate to.
 e.g. languages: en|de|es|fr|it|ja|ko|pt|ru|zh|zh-tw

options.label: loobby to audio reader ([color="255 0 0"]experimental[/color])
options.tooltip:
The lobby audio reader enables you to 
 stay connected to the lobby environment 
 even when you are away from your computer. 
 By utilizing audio output, it allows you to listen to important updates, 
 announcements, and conversations happening in the lobby,
 providing you with the flexibility to stay informed 
 and engaged without needing to be physically present at the monitor.

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Lobby:[/color] chat subject hide
options.tooltip: Hide initial lobby subject message

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Lobby:[/color] game list show host name
options.tooltip: Show the name of the host for every game in the list

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Lobby:[/color] resize bars enabled
options.tooltip: Have resize bars enabled

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Lobby:[/color] pingall ignore users list
options.tooltip: List of users you don't want to ping when using the command pingall. Each entry must be separated by a comma.

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Graphics:[/color] corpses max
options.tooltip: Maximum number of corpses to show. 0 means none, 200 means unlimited. Performance degrades above 50

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Game setup:[/color] countdown enable
options.tooltip: Automatically enable countdown when hosting

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Game setup:[/color] countdown default time
options.tooltip: Countdown default time in (seconds)

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Game:[/color] stats overlay visible
options.tooltip: Show players basic statistics in an overlay

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Game:[/color] Brightness of player names
options.tooltip: Adjust the brightness intensity for the player names.

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Game:[/color] players overlay visible
options.tooltip: Show observers and offline players in an overlay

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Game:[/color] Delete no warning
options.tooltip: Don't show confirmation dialog when deleting unit

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Game:[/color] Chat panel size change
options.tooltip: Modify chat panel size

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Game:[/color] Chat panel size
options.tooltip: Size string

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Game:[/color] Chat panel font change
options.tooltip: Modify chat panel font

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Game:[/color] Chat panel font
options.tooltip: Font string

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Global:[/color] remove all Unicode characters
options.tooltip: remove all Unicode characters. Some users don't use a keyboard that support this icons it in the chat.

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Game:[/color] Default stance healers
options.tooltip: Default stance healers have when they spawn

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Global:[/color] Reset all AutoCiv settings
options.tooltip: Resets all AutoCiv (REQUIRES RESTART) (DOESN'T RESET CUSTOM AUTOCIV SETTINGS)

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Global:[/color][color="255 0 0"] Resets all AutoCivP settings.[/color] (more intuitive)
options.tooltip: Resets all AutoCiv (REQUIRES RESTART) ([color="255 0 0"]Backup first![/color])

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Global:[/color][color="255 0 0"] allow Super+Key in hotkeys[/color]
options.tooltip: ([color="255 0 0"]conflicts with some keybindings eventually[/color])

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Global:[/color][color="255 0 0"] debug[/color]
options.tooltip: ([color="255 0 0"]enables debugging messages[/color])

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Global:[/color] use icon without delimiter
options.tooltip: dont use <icon> delimiter in chat. default is dopple tab for remove all icons delimiters

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Global:[/color] Chat icon delimiter
options.tooltip:
default is ⟨ or empty.
 To improve command searchability, consider adding a prefix to special short icon (☯ ♪♣‹) commands like '<gg⟦Tab⟧' or '<mus⟦Tab⟧' ♪ to distinguish them from profile commands.

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Global:[/color] Copy all chat messages
options.tooltip:
default is copy only the last message sent to you 
 empty your chat and pres ⟦Tab⟧. 
 get N mesages from your copy press msgN⟦Tab⟧ like msg1⟦Tab⟧ or msg3⟦Tab⟧.

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Postfix UserName[/color]: use ★ or * to show when i using proGUI mod
options.tooltip:
its fairplay when other player know that you are using proGUI mod. 
 it shows when you are using proGUI mod. 
 but you could use ★ to show that you are using proGUI mod. as a shortcut.

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Postfix UserName[/color]: use ♇ or AP to show when useing autocivP
options.tooltip:
not related to fairplay. 
 it shows when you are using autocivP mod with a shortcut. 
 ♇ for: P in autocivP, L for command Line.

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Postfix UserName[/color]: use local ratings?
options.tooltip: appends local ratings to your custom ratings.

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Postfix UserName[/color]: appends all above?
options.tooltip:
appends to custom rating.
 it appends all the optional values with '|',
 like myusername(1350|proGUI|spec. not play!).

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Use local ratings[/color]?
options.tooltip: Use local ratings instead of ratings.

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]no UserName in GameNames[/color]?
options.tooltip: cuts of your username from game name Suggestions

options.label: [color="204 133 0"]Game name Suggestion[/color]. next fullMinute
options.tooltip:
(default is next full 30 minutes ⟨ or empty)
 e.g. next full 30 minutes 12:30 13:00. to disable, set to empty 
 hint: 
 1 hour = 60 minutes 
 2 hours = 120 minutes 
 3 hours = 180 minutes
 4 hours = 240 minutes
 5 hours = 300 minutes 
 6 hours = 360 minutes 
 7 hours = 420 minutes 
 8 hours = 480 minutes 
 9 hours = 540 minutes 
 10 hours = 600 minutes 
 1 day = 720 minutes

options.label: [color="204 133 0"]Game name Suggestion[/color]. Any text you like
options.tooltip: Any text you like. will be added to your others game names snippets.

options.label: [color="204 133 0"]Game name Suggestion[/color] chose countries... -->
options.tooltip: set to empty or select a name postfix

list.label: Europe/Lettland: This refers to the time zone of Latvia.
Europe/London: This refers to the time zone of London, which is in the United Kingdom.
Europe/Athens: This refers to the time zone of Athens, which is in Greece.
America/Chicago: This refers to the Eastern Time Zone in the United States.
America/New_York/North Carolina: This refers to the Eastern Time Zone in the United States.
America/Los_Angeles: This refers to the Eastern Time Zone in the United States.

options.label: [color="204 133 0"]Game name Suggestion[/color]: removes all :00 from time ?
options.tooltip: removes all occurrences of :00 from the time
